channel.description: Recent content in healthy housing on Environment & Health Data Portal

item.title: Housing
item.description: No family should have to choose between affordable and healthy housing. All tenants are entitled to safe, decent and sanitary housing, which prevents disease and injury. In New York City, substandard or poor housing tends to cluster in neighborhoods. Homes that are deteriorating or dilapidated, or homes near buildings with broken or boarded-up windows, disproportionately tend to be in low-income neighborhoods, although the differences for these indicators have decreased. Housing and Health Housing quality impacts health directly and indirectly.
